entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Val-d'Or
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing drizzle changing to freezing rain this evening then to rain overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
